content:
hi
posted before and it disappeared, so re-posting

our product holds under conditions domain these types:
condition,
problem,
socialHistory,
functionalStatus,
cognitiveStatus,
chiefComplaint,
diagnosis,
reaction

is there a FHIR expectation (certification wise) to output only specific types under conditions resource (US core)?

thanks!

Some of these have other homes in FHIR, but not necessarily exclusively. For example, you'll want to review

  • Observation with a category of "social-history" and "exam" (for what you labeled as "socialHistory" and "cognitiveStatus")
  • AllergyIntolerance (for what you labeled as "reaction")

In some cases, if you're observing something and tracking it on a problem list, FHIR would say that you may need two resources represent it (I'm curious how common this is in practice).
Your original post (and responses to it) are here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/multiple.20condition.20types
